notes: The Cosmetic Compliance & Safety Management Group (CCSMG) was founded by former FDA compliance officers, bringing insider knowledge of FDA enforcement priorities and inspection procedures to cosmetic manufacturers. They specialize in practical, implementable compliance solutions with particular expertise in GMP implementation and auditing. CCSMG's risk-based approach helps manufacturers focus resources on the highest priority compliance areas. Their training programs are highly regarded for preparing teams for FDA inspections and building internal compliance capabilities. CCSMG serves small to large manufacturers seeking practical FDA compliance guidance.
